member.name: T:VirusTotalTestbed.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:VirusTotalTestbed.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:VirusTotalTestbed.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain
member.summary: Simple test application intended to explore the VirusTotal public API. This is a VB.NET port of the excellent and comprehensive code developed and submitted by Genbox: https://github.com/Genbox/VirusTotal.NET

member.name: M:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain.cmdOpen_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Browses the file system for a file to load and scan.

member.name: M:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain.cmdReport_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Submits a report request to VirusTotal based on the SHA-256 hash of the file. NOTE: This function should be called first, to reduce the burden on their servers.

member.name: M:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain.cmdSubmit_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Submits the file itself to VirusTotal for examination and scanning. NOTE: This should be done only if no report is already available.

member.name: M:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain.cmdRescan_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Requests a rescan of the file. This would be useful in the event that a previously submitted file was found to be infected after it was scanned and found clean. Not necessary under most circumstances.

member.name: M:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain.cmdComment_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Attach a comment to an entry. Obviously the entry must have been submitted and scanned prior to this function being invoked.

member.name: M:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain.cmdPrev_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Move to the previous item in the list of scan results.

member.name: M:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain.cmdNext_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Move to the next item in the list of scan results.

member.name: M:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain.lblLink2_LinkClicked(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs)
member.summary: Display the public HTML report using the default browser.

member.name: P:VirusTotalTestbed.frmMain.ResultIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the item being viewed from the list of scan results.

member.name: T:VirusTotalTestbed.ReportResponseCode
member.summary: Other than removing the URL functions and converting the IEnumerable code to utilize a List(Of T) instead, the following classes and enums are pretty much a direct port of the example code provided by Genbox, which can be found at: https://github.com/Genbox/VirusTotal.NET Also, as you can probably tell, I'm not really big on documentation, but the code is simple enough that you should be able to to understand it with little trouble. :)
